ctu_text: "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "The benefit of the scheme will be given only on the death of the indigent artist. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "The deceased should have professionally served for the enrichment of any one of the art disciplines or more such as music, dance, drama, film, folk arts, etc. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "The annual income of the deceased artist or their legal spouse should not have exceeded \u20b912,000/-.
